abstract: Letter from Chirlane McCray, New York City's first lady, comments on March 29 article about regulators loosening restrictions on allowing those with some forms of mental illness to pilot planes.
lead_paragraph: Chirlane McCray, New York’s first lady, writes that “it’s time to recognize the stress and responsibility that pilots face and change our regulations and policies to ensure their mental health.”

headline.main: Chirlane McCray, on the Germanwings Co-Pilot’s Mental Health
